title: Wereking

Siddhima (Sid) strolls through life, skirting the confines of traditional marriage. Her relationship with the wereleopard is the ultimate disgrace, especially after the carelessness of unsafe sex. When her mother, a powerful witch, finds out, Sid canâ€™t stop her from doing what it takes to keep the two apart.
